title: What is the procedure for getting admission in a Super 30 after class 11? - Quora

response.answer_text: I will give u tips for getting top 5 highest scorer student 1- study 12 to 16 hours daily revise too.. 2 - be cruel yourself I mean decide you not allow your self to break the 14 hour study bunk .. 3- remove your social activity for 1 year only .. 4 -not touch or see your smart phone . 5- forget all friend who involved you in many worth activity daily .. 6 -no movie no TV No songs be like a machine .. 7 - no social gathering forget all festival marriage birthday party sangeet dance etc etc 8- if you break any rule then punish your self and then you will study 1 hour more . 9- your time tablet must be set by you .. 10 - today you count your daily routine and then you realize ,you are spending too much time in piddle way And really if you able to control your self And concerned only study in 2 or 4 year more then you will became Doctor ,engineer ,scientists or any goal of life. Best of luck
